output: html_notebook

## Load packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(readxl)
library(skimr)
library(summarytools)
```


Loads the enrollment data from the excel spreadsheet

```{r}
dfa <- read_xlsx("CU_ACAD_DEPT_ENRL.xlsx") %>% clean_names()
```

```{r}

skim(dfa)
```
```{r}
c <- dfa %>% group_by(subject) %>% skim()
```

```{r}
dfa %>% dfSummary() %>% view()
```
